text: Brilliant experience using the infrared sauna. Communication before the appointment was great, the team are super friendly and the space was very relaxing!

My friend and I went for the 'just 4 yue' package and OMG what an experience!
All aspects were incredible but the float itself was out of this world - I hadn't experienced a float before but I will certainly be booking again!
We felt like new women by the time we left - 10/10 recommend

I went just to try the massage chair and the chair itself was nice, but I really liked the whole ambience of the experience, i.e. the mood lighting, the privacy, and even the aromatherapy oils used. And the service was great too, definitely interested in trying it again, and maybe even the other “float” stuff.
Amazing experience which left me feeling totally reborn! Already planning my next visit! Plus had a Sports Massage which was out of this world! Highly recommend!
